definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS

sentences.chinese: 我要了杜松子酒和苦艾酒。

sentences.english: Wormwood dis a good way to detoxify your body.
sentences.chinese: 苦艾茶是身体排毒不错的选择。

sentences.english: To make this preparation for 3 to 4 people, I use an ABSINTHE service.
sentences.chinese: 为3到4个人准备这种酒，我使用苦艾酒服务。
你给他们喝的是苦艾酒？

sentences.english: Bohemians also burn sugar into their absinthe to mellow its bitter anise flavour.
sentences.chinese: 波希米亚人也将糖放入苦艾酒中以减少茴香的苦味。

sentences.english: I've never liked the taste of vermouth.
sentences.chinese: 我从不喜欢苦艾酒的味道。

sentences.english: She added only a hint of vermouth to the gin.
sentences.chinese: 她只在杜松子酒里加了少许苦艾酒。

sentences.english: Stir whisky and Sweet Vermouth in glass.
sentences.chinese: 威士忌及甜苦艾酒倒入杯里搅匀。

sentences.english: Don't worry, I won't be hitting the absinthe or the mugwort to try to induce the visions tonight.
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我今晚不会再用苦艾酒或艾蒿来做预知梦了。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutic effect of wormwood in mice infected with Plasmodium berghei.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察苦艾对感染伯氏疟原虫小鼠的疗效。

sentences.english: Stir in vermouth and tomatoes, scraping up any brown bits from bottom of skillet .
sentences.chinese: 把苦艾酒和番茄搅拌，从煎锅底部抹去少量的棕色物。

sentences.english: Tell us the status of the place where the shows of "Absinthe" and "La Vie" are presented.
sentences.chinese: 告诉我们“苦艾酒”和“生活”表演的地方的情况。

sentences.english: You can use equal parts ofwater and vermouth or vodka.
sentences.chinese: 也可以用等量的水和苦艾酒或是伏特加。

sentences.english: Then I recommend the Sweet Vermouth and Dubonnet.
sentences.chinese: 那么我推荐甜苦艾酒以及杜邦内葡萄酒。

definition: aromatic herb/vanilla/alternative name for Eupatorium fortunei/(fig.) loyal and dependable person (old)
